Here's another way to get to #YourTorontoZoo!

Today we are very excited to welcome the first bus of the newly launched @GOtransit Bus Route 96Z, which will provide services directly to the Zoo every weekend until September 6th, 2021. For details, visit https://t.co/lFUlBlwovG https://t.co/O3zdpt6bj1
